name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday (January 17) rejected TikTok's appeal against the "Sell or Ban" bill, upholding Congress's ban on TikTok. This may result in 170 million users in the United States being unable to continue using TikTok after the 19th.
The Supreme Court ruled that the law did not violate the right to free speech under the First Amendment of the U.S. Constitution, and that the U.S. government's national security concerns about Chinese companies that own TikTok were reasonable.
The court wrote in an unsigned opinion: "There is no doubt that for more than 170 million Americans, TikTok provides a unique and extensive channel of expression, participation, and community. But Congress has determined that divestiture is necessary to address its national security concerns about TikTok's data collection and relationship with foreign adversaries."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the international version of Xiaohongshu has been released. In addition to being able to log in with WeChat and QQ, the international version also supports logging in with Google and Facebook accounts. The data of the international and domestic versions are interoperable, but the international version currently does not have a translation function.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Panhua Insurance Hunan Branch launched an "employee welfare" financial product, which pays principal and interest annually.
The company said that even if you don't understand finance, you can get the principal and interest returned on time. For this benefit that is guaranteed to make money, many employees invested their life savings and bought the company's financial products, but since the beginning of last year, the company has been unable to pay the principal and interest.
A victim told the police who were maintaining stability, "I have lost all my property now, and I am not afraid of anything now"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 16, Qingdao, Shandong. Detai Construction Company owed workers wages. Workers knelt on the ground and held up a cardboard to demand their wages. The cardboard read: "Migrant workers with cancer, demanding wages to save their lives, give me back the money I spent to save my life"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 17 (Release) A netizen commented in the Anhui Fire Department live broadcast room: "Why can't I get through to your corps' Discipline Inspection Commission? Can you reply?" 
The netizen was immediately banned by Anhui Fire Department.
